thread.title: Olympic diver Tom Daley engaged to Dustin Lance Black
thread.title_full: Olympic diver Tom Daley engaged to Dustin Lance Black

title: Olympic diver Tom Daley engaged to Dustin Lance Black
text:
Olympic diver Tom Daley engaged to Dustin Lance Black Bronze-medal winner announces engagement on Instagram By Lisa Respers France CNN POSTED: 09:34 AM MDT Oct 02, 2015 UPDATED: 10:56 AM MDT Oct 02, 2015 
Olympic diver Tom Daley is officially off the market. Related Content John Oliver to Colbert: 'I don't care... 
The bronze-medal winner announced via Instagram that he is now engaged to his boyfriend of two years, Academy Award-winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black. 
"#HeSaidYES and then #ISaidYES Thanks for all the lovely messages!" says the caption on a photo of their rings and a newspaper announcement of their engagement. 
Daley, 21, came out in a YouTube video in 2013. His fiance, 41, won a best original screenplay Oscar for the 2008 film "Milk."
